readme_file.description: The name of the readme file.

table_names.description: Name of the table or tables that according to the README file are wholly or partially created by the script given in script_file. If the script creates multiple tables, write a comma separated list, e.g. 'Table 1, Table 3, Table A2.'

figure_names.description: Name of the figure or figures that according to the README file are wholly or partially created by the script. If the script creates multiple figures, write a comma separated list, e.g. 'Figure 2, Figure 5'
